Chief Technology Officer

Company: Global Enterprise Corp
Location: San Francisco, CA (Hybrid)
Reports to: CEO

About Us:
Global Enterprise Corp is a high-growth SaaS company serving Fortune 500 clients. We're looking for a visionary CTO to lead our technology strategy and scale our engineering organization.

Responsibilities:
- Define and execute technology vision aligned with business strategy
- Scale engineering organization from 150 to 300+ engineers
- Lead digital transformation initiatives driving revenue growth
- Oversee cloud infrastructure and platform reliability at scale
- Build and mentor high-performing engineering leadership team
- Partner with CEO and board on technology investment decisions
- Drive M&A technical due diligence and integration

Requirements:
- 15+ years of software engineering experience, 8+ years in senior leadership
- Track record of scaling engineering organizations in high-growth environments
- Experience with cloud-native architectures at scale (millions of transactions)
- Strong background in platform engineering and DevOps practices
- MBA or technical graduate degree preferred
- Experience presenting to boards and executive stakeholders
- Proven ability to drive digital transformation with measurable business impact

Technical Requirements:
- Cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
- Kubernetes and container orchestration
- Data engineering and real-time analytics
- Security and compliance frameworks
- AI/ML platform experience

Compensation:
- Base: $450K - $550K
- Equity: 0.5% - 1.0%
- Bonus: 50% target
